about_the_game:
The Last Game is a high-stakes, horror-filled experience where players face the ultimate opponent—the Angel of Death. After your demise, you're thrust into a deadly dice poker match where the currency isn’t chips or money, but the days of your life. Win, and you may regain precious time. Lose, and your days slip away forever. Can you outsmart Death, or will your remaining days run out?

The game features realistic, physics-based dice rolling mechanics, making every roll feel both tactile and intense. Each moment is critical, as every decision could bring you closer to freedom or seal your fate.

The Last Game takes survival to the next level with its unique time mechanic: the days you win are real-time, and they tick down even when you're not playing the game. Watch out—every second you aren't in the game could be one step closer to losing everything.

Compete against others on a leader-board that tracks who has the most days left. Can you outplay Death and rise to the top, or will you see your name vanish as your time runs out?

With its eerie, horror atmosphere and the ever-present threat of Death looming over you, The Last Game delivers a chilling blend of suspense, strategy, and survival. Will you reclaim your life, or is this truly your last game?

content_descriptors.notes: The Last Game contains depictions of death, including interactions with the Angel of Death as a central character. The game explores themes of mortality and the afterlife in a tense and eerie atmosphere.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 3.0+ GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4500 (2 * 2200) or equivalent, AMD Athlon 64 X2 4200+ (2 * 2200) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: In The Last Game, face the Angel of Death in a high-stakes dice poker match for your life. The currency? Days of your existence. Win back time or risk losing it all in this tense battle of chance and strategy. Can you outsmart Death, or will your days run out?
